reading.title: Opinion piece
reading.description: Read a Dutch opinion article. Answer five comprehension questions.

listening.title: Interview clip
listening.description: Listen to a short interview about a current topic. Answer five comprehension questions.

speaking.prompt: Debate a topic in Dutch. State your opinion and respond to a counterargument, using mixed tenses.

writing.prompt: Write an opinion essay on a current topic in the Netherlands. Use at least 80 words and mixed tenses.
